document_data.name: Helvara
document_data.mainbody: '''Helvara''' was a city found in the [[Lost Kingdoms|Lost Kingdom]] of [[Anauria]].
document_data.Geography: It was situated on the southern bank of [[Lake Miir]] near the [[Desertsmouth Mountains]].
document_data.Trade: Helvara served as the kingdom's primary producer of agricultural goods and personal supplies.
document_data.History:
The city was founded some time after the fall of [[Netheril]] in {{Yearlink|-339}}, as the enclave of Anauria expanded into a great kingdom of multiple cities.

In the {{YearlinkName|111}}, a horde of [[orc]]s and [[goblinoid]] forces led by the shaman [[Andegril|Andegril the Wise]] caused the collapse of Anauria and all of the cities within.According to pages 116 of ''[[Netheril: Empire of Magic|Netheril Empire of Magic: The Winds of Netheril]]'', this event occurred in [[450 DR]]. This is direct conflict with a statement on page 12 of the same book that says the kingdom fell in [[111 DR|3970 Netheril Year]], or 111 DR.
